channel.title: Alumni on YiLab

item.title: Yibo Zhang
item.description: Research Interests: Calmodulin Green manure Regulation of phosphate homeostasis Education: 2019 - 2023, PhD in Plant Nutrition, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Science 2015-2018, MSc in Agricultural Resources and environment, Henan Agricultural University Contact: Email: utopiazhangyb@163.

item.title: Tian Zhou
item.description: Tian Zhou, a graduate student from Chinese Academy of Agricultural Science, majors in Resource Utilization and Plant Protection, researching in the interaction between phosphorus and zinc in rice. Research Interests: Molecular Biology Plant Physiology Education: 2020 - Present, MSc in Resource Utilization and Plant Protection, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Science 2016 - 2020, B.

item.title: Yuxin Zhang
item.description: YUXIN ZHANG, a graduate student from Chinese Academy of Agricultural Science, majors in Molecular Biology and Plant Physiology, researching in the signaling pathways of phosphorus in rice.
